body_html:
The url of eigen module in caffe2/.gitmodules line 10 is unreachable in previous caffe2:

[submodule "third_party/eigen"]
	path = third_party/eigen
	url = https://github.com/RLovelett/eigen.git

yeah this problem has been fixed in pytorch-caffe2 by new url in pytorch/.gitmodules line 17:

[submodule "third_party/eigen"]
	path = third_party/eigen
	url = https://github.com/eigenteam/eigen-git-mirror.git

I still expect that the previous caffe2 can be updated. Thanks.

[submodule "third_party/eigen"]
	path = third_party/eigen
	url = https://github.com/RLovelett/eigen.git 

yeah this problem has been fixed in pytorch-caffe2  by new url in pytorch/.gitmodules line 17:

body:
The url of eigen module in _caffe2/.gitmodules_ line 10 is unreachable in previous [caffe2](https://github.com/caffe2/caffe2):
```
[submodule "third_party/eigen"]
	path = third_party/eigen
	url = https://github.com/RLovelett/eigen.git 
```

yeah this problem has been fixed in pytorch-caffe2  by [new url](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/.gitmodules) in _pytorch/.gitmodules_ line 17:

```
[submodule "third_party/eigen"]
	path = third_party/eigen
	url = https://github.com/eigenteam/eigen-git-mirror.git
```

I still expect that the previous caffe2 can be updated. Thanks.
